Class Place

java.lang.Object
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model.Place
public class Place extends Object
Represents a place, such as a room or corridor, that a character in the game can travel through. Each instance is also contained, or exists within, a single World instance.

    • isTravelAllowedToward

      public boolean isTravelAllowedToward(Direction d)
      Returns true if travel is allowed in the specified direction from this place, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      d - the non-null direction of travel.
      Returns:
      true if travel is allowed in the specified direction from this place, false otherwise.

    • getTravelDestinationToward

      public Place getTravelDestinationToward(Direction d)
      Gets the destination of travel in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      d - the non-null direction of travel.
      Returns:
      the destination of travel in the specified direction, or null if travel is not allowed in that direction.
      See Also:
      • isTravelAllowedToward(Direction)

      Sets the destination of travel in the specified direction for this place.
      Parameters:
      d - the non-null direction of travel.
      l - the non-null destination of travel in the specified direction.
